alert.note: Alert for Smith; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 7:23PM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Sabine River Near Mineola affecting Smith and Wood Counties. For the Sabine River...including Mineola, Hawkins, Gladewater, Longview, Beckville, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Mineola. * WHEN...From late Monday night to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Expect flooding of secondary roadways with picnic and recreational areas flooded as well. Also expect flooded boat ramps as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 14.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued Monday Morning at 10 AM CST.
